author: Fairoze
content:
Hi kar2on..my problem still not yet resolve. 
I think my mistake is not connect the LAN1 cable to my laptop 
to setup the router for the first time. So what I did was just try to setup over
Wifi connection. And the result is I'm facing the Internet connection type timed out. Then I think maybe it was the firmware so I load it with this firmware 3.0.0.4.374.430..and still received same error which is Internet connection type timed out. 
So this morning I try to connect the LAN1 cable to my laptop and I run through the QIS.. The process stuck after I key in my unifi username and password. It says it requires 60 Seconds.. But it's not... 
Is it because of the firmware I'm using? Or anything else..?
